vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κατακῡριεύω,
gain or exercise complete dominion, [LXX]
__2 κ. τινός gain dominion over, gain possession of,[LXX+NT]; [πλοίου] [Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to lord it over, gain dominion over, master
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to lord it over, gain dominion over, master
to get into one's power;, in NT to bring under, master, overcome,subdue; in some contexts there is an implication that this exercise of authority is harsh; to get into one's power;, in NT to bring under, master, overcome, Acts 19:16; to domineer over, lord it over Mt. 20:25; Mk. 10:42; 1Pet. 5:3*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: dominar, tener poder sobre (HCH.19:16) ; tratar de mostrar la autoridad de uno sobre (1PE.5:3)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 使服於權柄之下, 制服, 做主人 (徒 19:16)
2) 統治, 掌管, 作主人 (太 20:25; 可 10:42; 彼前 5:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 使服于权柄之下, 制服, 做主人 (徒 19:16)
2) 统治, 掌管, 作主人 (太 20:25; 可 10:42; 彼前 5:3)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: kiểm soát, điều chỉnh, điều hoà, kiềm chế; chinh phục, khuất phục; thực thi quyền cai trị thật sự; thống trị trên; vượt qua, chiến thắng
